snippet.title: Forefront - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
From the creators of Breachers and Hyper Dash, Forefront is a game that delivers an all-out war experience like never before in VR. 🟥🪨 Engage in massive 32-player battles in vast, semi-destructible environments, where land, sea, and air vehicles are just as crucial as your firepower.

⚡ Early Access in 2025 – Playtests begin this summer!
📌 Wishlist now to be the first to fight!
🔗 Join our community: forefrontvr.com/discord

---

🚁 Command land, sea, and air vehicles – Pilot helicopters, drive tanks, and storm objectives in humvees and boats.

🔫 Choose your class – Play as Assault, Engineer, Medic, or Sniper, each with specialized weapons and gadgets.

🔥 Feel the impact – Realistic gun-play, tactical movement, and large-scale combat bring the battlefield to life.

💥 Shape the fight – Blast through walls, collapse structures, and use destruction to create new paths or deny enemy cover.

The year is 2035. A powerful energy corporation, O.R.E., has built a private military to defend its monopoly on Red Orpiment, a rare mineral set to power the world, while local governments and resistance fighters battle to reclaim control. You are the tip of the spear in the war to control it—which side will you take?

---

Follow our socials:
➡️ Discord: https://forefrontvr.com/discord
➡️ BlueSky: https://bsky.app/profile/forefrontvr.com
➡️ Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/forefrontvr
